COMMAND.name: show spanning-tree
COMMAND.help: Show spanning tree information
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${vlan}" = ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py get_custom_stp show_stp.j2
elif test "${name}" = "";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py get_custom_stp_vlan show_stp.j2 ${vlan-id}
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py get_custom_stp_vlan_interfaces_interface show_stp.j2 ${vlan-id} ${name}
fi

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows spanning-tree information
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command is useful in viewing the spanning-tree information
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
Spanning-tree Mode: PVST
VLAN 100 - STP instance 0 ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ STP Bridge Parameters:
Bridge Bridge Bridge Bridge Hold LastTopology Topology Identifier MaxAge Hello FwdDly Time Change Change hex sec sec sec sec sec cnt 80643c2c99a704a0 20 2 15 1 515 4
RootBridge RootPath DesignatedBridge Root Max Hel Fwd Identifier Cost Identifier Port Age lo Dly hex hex sec sec sec 00646cb9c51613ca 1600 10643c2c992d8235 PortChannel120 2 15
STP Port Parameters: Port Prio Path Port Uplink BPDU State Designated Designated Designated Num rity Cost Fast Fast Filter Cost Root bridge PortChannel1 128 800 N N N FORWARDING 800 00646cb9c51613ca 10643c2c992d8235

COMMAND.name: show spanning-tree counters
COMMAND.help: Show spanning tree counters information

PARAM.name: vlan
PARAM.help: Spanning tree counters for a VLAN

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${vlan}" = ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py get_custom_stp_counters show_stp_counters.j2
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py get_custom_stp_counters_vlan show_stp_counters.j2 ${vlan-id}
fi
builtin="clish_nop"

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows spanning-tree counters information
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command is useful in viewing the spanning-tree counters information
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic(config)# do show spanning-tree counters
VLAN 100 - STP instance 0 ---------------------------------------------------------------------- PortNum BPDU Tx BPDU Rx TCN Tx TCN Rx
---------------------------------------------------------------------- Ethernet0 0 0 0 0 Ethernet48 53 7 1 0 Ethernet62 0 0 0 0 Ethernet64 0 0 0 0 PortChannel1 0 76 1 0 PortChannel2 0 0 0 0 PortChannel3 0 0 0 0

COMMAND.name: show spanning-tree inconsistentports
COMMAND.help: Show spanning tree ROOT guard information

PARAM.name: vlan
PARAM.help: Spanning ROOT guard information for VLAN

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${vlan}" = ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py get_custom_stp_inconsistentports show_stp_root_guard.j2
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py get_custom_stp_inconsistentports_vlan show_stp_root_guard.j2 ${vlan-id}
fi

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows spanning-tree root inconsistent information
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command is useful in viewing the spanning-tree root inconsistent ports information
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE:
sonic# show spanning-tree inconsistentports
Root guard timeout: 30 secs
---------------------------------------------------------------------- PortNum VLAN Inconsistency State ---------------------------------------------------------------------- Ethernet48 100 Root Inconsistent (29 seconds left on timer)

COMMAND.name: show spanning-tree bpdu-guard
COMMAND.help: Show spanning tree BPDU guard information

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Shows spanning-tree BPDU guard information
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command is useful in viewing the spanning-tree BPDU guard information for the ports
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic#show spanning-tree bpdu-guard PortNum Shutdown Port shut Configured due to BPDU guard Ethernet64 Y N PortChannel2 Y N

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree
COMMAND.help: Configure spanning tree

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree edge-port
COMMAND.help: Configure spanning tree edge port

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure spanning-tree global level BPDU filter
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows configuring global level BPDU filter
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# spanning-tree edge-port bpdufilter default

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree mode
COMMAND.help: Configure spanning tree mode {pvst | rapid-pvst}
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${mode-subcmds}" = "";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py post_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_global_config_enabled_protocol "pvst"
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py post_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_global_config_enabled_protocol ${__params}
fi

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure the global spanning-tree mode for the device
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows configuring the spanning-tree mode for the device. There are 2 modes supported - pvst and rapid-pvst.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)#spanning-tree mode pvst

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree vlan
COMMAND.help: Configure spanning tree for VLAN

PARAM.name: forward-time
PARAM.help: Set the forward delay time for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: seconds
PARAM.help: Number of seconds for the forward time ((default = 15)

PARAM.name: hello-time
PARAM.help: Set the hello time for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: seconds
PARAM.help: Number of seconds for the hello time (default = 2)

PARAM.name: max-age
PARAM.help: Set the max age time for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: seconds
PARAM.help: Number of seconds for the max age time (default = 20)

PARAM.name: priority
PARAM.help: Set the bridge priority for the spanning tree

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure spanning-tree parameters on per VLAN basis
DOCGEN.USAGE: These commands are similar to the global level commands but allow configuring the spanning-tree parameters on per VLAN basis.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)#spanning-tree vlan 100 sonic(config)#spanning-tree vlan 100 forward-time 11 sonic(config)#spanning-tree vlan 100 hello-time 3 sonic(config)#spanning-tree vlan 100 max-age 22 sonic(config)#spanning-tree vlan 100 priority 4096

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree forward-time
COMMAND.help: Set the forward delay time for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: seconds
PARAM.help: Number of seconds for the forward time ((default = 15)

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure the spanning-tree forward delay time.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows configuring the forward delay time in seconds (default = 15), range 4-30.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# spanning-tree forward-time 20

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree guard
COMMAND.help: Set the spanning tree guard

PARAM.name: value
PARAM.help: root guard timeout value in seconds

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure the spanning-tree root guard timeout.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows configuring a root guard timeout value. Once superior BPDUs stop coming on the port, device will wait for a period until root guard timeout before moving the port to forwarding state(default = 30 secs), range 5-600.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# spanning-tree guard root timeout 10

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree hello-time
COMMAND.help: Set the hello time for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: seconds
PARAM.help: Number of seconds for the hello time (default = 2)

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure the spanning-tree hello time value.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allow configuring the hello interval in secs for transmission of bpdus (default = 2), range 1-10.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# spanning-tree hello-time 3

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree max-age
COMMAND.help: Set the max age time for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: seconds
PARAM.help: Number of seconds for the max age time (default = 20)

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure the spanning-tree max-age time value.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows configuring the maximum time to listen for root bridge in seconds (default = 20), range 6-40.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# spanning-tree max-age 22

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree priority
COMMAND.help: Set the priority for the spanning tree

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure the global level spanning-tree bridge priority value.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows configuring the bridge priority in increments of 4096, range 0-61440
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# spanning-tree priority 4096

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree
COMMAND.help: Unconfigure spanning tree

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree edge-port
COMMAND.help: Unconfigure spanning tree edge port

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree mode
COMMAND.help: Unconfigure spanning tree

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Disable global spanning-tree mode for the device
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows disabling the spanning-tree mode for the device.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)#no spanning-tree mode

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree vlan
COMMAND.help: Unconfigure spanning tree on VLAN

PARAM.name: forward-time
PARAM.help: Unset the forward time for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: hello-time
PARAM.help: Unset the forward time for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: max-age
PARAM.help: Unset the max age time for the spanning tree

PARAM.name: priority
PARAM.help: Unset the priority for the spanning tree

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure spanning-tree parameters on per VLAN basis
DOCGEN.USAGE: These commands are similar to the global level commands but allow disabling the spanning-tree parameters on per VLAN basis.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)#no spanning-tree vlan 100 sonic(config)#no spanning-tree vlan 100 forward-time sonic(config)#no spanning-tree vlan 100 hello-time sonic(config)#no spanning-tree vlan 100 max-age sonic(config)#no spanning-tree vlan 100 priority

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree forward-time
COMMAND.help: Unset the forward time for the spanning tree

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Remove the spanning-tree forward delay time configuration
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows resetting the forward delay time to default value
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# no spanning-tree forward-time

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree guard
COMMAND.help: Unset the spanning tree guard

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Remove the spanning-tree root guard timeout.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows resetting the root guard timeout value.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# no spanning-tree guard root timeout

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree hello-time
COMMAND.help: Unset the hello time for the spanning tree

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Remove the spanning-tree hello time configuration.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows resetting the hello interval configuration.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)#no spanning-tree hello-time

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree max-age
COMMAND.help: Set the max age time for the spanning tree

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Remove the spanning-tree max-age time value.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows resetting the max age configuration.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)#no spanning-tree max-age

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree priority
COMMAND.help: Unset the priority for the spanning tree

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Remove the global level spanning-tree bridge priority value.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows resetting the bridge priority to default value
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)#no spanning-tree priority

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree
COMMAND.help: Configure spanning tree on interface

PARAM.name: bpduguard
PARAM.help: Enables bpdu guard on the interface

PARAM.name: port-shutdown
PARAM.help: Enable port shutdown on bpdu guard violation

PARAM.name: link-type
PARAM.help: Set link type of the interface

PARAM.name: point-to-point
PARAM.help: link type of given interface is point-to-point.

PARAM.name: shared
PARAM.help: link type of given interface is shared.

PARAM.name: uplinkfast
PARAM.help: Enables uplink fast on the interface

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "bpduguard";then
if test "${port-shutdown}" != "";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_guard_port_shutdown ${iface} True
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_guard ${iface} True
fi
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "portfast";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_portfast ${iface} True
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "uplinkfast";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_uplink_fast ${iface} True
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "enable";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_spanning_tree_enable ${iface} True
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "cost";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_cost ${iface} ${value}
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "port-priority";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_port_priority ${iface} ${value}
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "link-type";then
if test "${link-sub-cmds}" = "auto";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py delete_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_link_type ${iface}
elif test "${link-sub-cmds}" = "point-to-point";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_link_type ${iface} "P2P"
elif test "${link-sub-cmds}" = "shared";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_link_type ${iface} "SHARED"
fi
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "port";then
if test "${edge}" != "";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_edge_port ${iface} True
fi
fi
builtin="clish_nop"

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure interface specific spanning-tree parameters.
DOCGEN.USAGE: These commands allow configuring interface specific spanning-tree parameters
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree bpduguard port-shutdown sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree cost 1000 sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree enable sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree portfast sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree port-priority 16 sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree uplinkfast sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree link-type point-to-point sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree port type edge

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree bpdufilter
COMMAND.help: Spanning-tree BPDU filter on the interface

PARAM.name: enable
PARAM.help: Enables spanning-tree BPDU filter on the interface

PARAM.name: disable
PARAM.help: Disable spanning-tree BPDU filter on the interface

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${bpdufilt_sub_cmds}" = "enable";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_filter ${iface} True
elif test "${bpdufilt_sub_cmds}" = "disable";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_filter ${iface} False
fi

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure interface specific bpdu-filter parameters.
DOCGEN.USAGE: These commands allow configuring interface specific bpdu-filter parameters
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree bpdufilter enable sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree bpdufilter disable

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree guard
COMMAND.help: Configure spanning tree guard on interface

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure interface specific guard root parameters.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This commands allows enabling guard root on an interface
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree guard root

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree vlan
COMMAND.help: Configure spanning tree on interface for VLAN

PARAM.name: cost
PARAM.help: Set the port level cost value for VLAN

PARAM.name: port-priority
PARAM.help: Set the port level priority value for a VLAN

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure interface and vlan specific spanning-tree parameters.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This commands allows configuring interface and vlan specific spanning-tree parameters.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree vlan 100 cost 1000 sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# spanning-tree vlan 100 port-priority 16

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree
COMMAND.help: Unconfigure spanning tree on interface

PARAM.name: bpdufilter
PARAM.help: if spanning-tree BPDU filter on the interface is disabled, global bpdufilter will be applied

PARAM.name: bpduguard
PARAM.help: Disabled bpdu guard on the interface

PARAM.name: port-shutdown
PARAM.help: disable port shutdown on bpdu guard violation

PARAM.name: cost
PARAM.help: Unset the port level cost value for a VLAN

PARAM.name: link-type
PARAM.help: Unset link type of the interface

PARAM.name: port-priority
PARAM.help: Reset the port level priority on the interface

PARAM.name: type
PARAM.help: Unset port type of the interface

PARAM.name: uplinkfast
PARAM.help: Disables uplink fast on the interface

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "bpduguard";then
if test "${port-shutdown}" != "";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_guard_port_shutdown ${iface} False
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_guard ${iface} False
fi
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "uplinkfast";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_uplink_fast ${iface} False
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "bpdufilter";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py delete_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_filter ${iface}
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "portfast";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_portfast ${iface} False
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "enable";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_spanning_tree_enable ${iface} False
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "cost";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py delete_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_cost ${iface}
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "port-priority";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py delete_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_port_priority ${iface}
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "link-type";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py delete_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_link_type ${iface}
elif test "${stp-if-subcmds}" = "port";then
if test "${type}" != "";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_edge_port ${iface} False
fi
fi
builtin="clish_nop"

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure interface specific spanning-tree parameters.
DOCGEN.USAGE: These commands allow removing interface specific spanning-tree parameters
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no spanning-tree bpdufilter sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no spanning-tree bpduguard port-shutdown sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no spanning-tree cost sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no spanning-tree enable sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no spanning-tree portfast sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no spanning-tree port-priority sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no spanning-tree uplinkfast sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no spanning-tree link-type sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no spanning-tree port type

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree guard
COMMAND.help: Unconfigure spanning tree guard on interface

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure guard root on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This commands allows disabling guard root on an interface
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no spanning-tree guard root

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree vlan
COMMAND.help: Unconfigure spanning tree on interface for given VLAN

PARAM.name: cost
PARAM.help: Unset the port level cost value for VLAN

PARAM.name: port-priority
PARAM.help: Unset the port level priority value for a VLAN

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure interface and vlan specific spanning-tree parameters.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This commands allows unconfiguring interface and vlan specific spanning-tree parameters.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface Ethernet 0 sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no spanning-tree vlan 100 cost sonic(conf-if-Ethernet0)# no spanning-tree vlan 100 port-priority

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree
COMMAND.help: Configure spanning tree on port-channel

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree bpduguard
COMMAND.help: Enables bpdu guard on the port-channel

PARAM.name: port-shutdown
PARAM.help: Enable port shutdown on bpdu guard violation

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${port-shutdown}" != "";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_guard_port_shutdown ${po_name} True
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_guard ${po_name} True
fi
builtin="clish_nop"

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure interface specific bpdu-guard parameters.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This commands allows enabling bpdu-guard on an interface
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree bpduguard port-shutdown

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree cost
COMMAND.help: Set the port level cost

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure spanning-tree cost on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows to configure the port level cost value, range 1 - 200000000
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree cost 1000

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree enable
COMMAND.help: Enables spanning-tree on the port-channel

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure spanning-tree on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows enabling of spanning-tree on an interface
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree enable

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree link-type
COMMAND.help: Set link type of the port-channel

PARAM.name: auto
PARAM.help: link type is set based on the duplex setting of the port-channel.

PARAM.name: point-to-point
PARAM.help: link type of given port-channel is point-to-point.

PARAM.name: shared
PARAM.help: link type of given port-channel is shared.

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${link-sub-cmds}" = "auto";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py delete_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_link_type ${po_name}
elif test "${link-sub-cmds}" = "point-to-point";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_link_type ${po_name} "P2P"
elif test "${link-sub-cmds}" = "shared";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_link_type ${po_name} "SHARED"
fi

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure spanning-tree link-type on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows setting the link-type of spanning-tree on an interface, link-type can be set to either point-point or shared.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree link-type point-to-point

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree portfast
COMMAND.help: Enables portfast on the port-channel

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure spanning-tree portfast on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows enabling portfast on an interface, portfast allows edge ports to move to forwarding state quickly when the connected device is not participating in spanning-tree.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree portfast

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree port-priority
COMMAND.help: Set the port level priority

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure spanning-tree port priority on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows setting port priority value on an interface, range 0 - 240 (default 128)
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree port-priority 16

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree port
COMMAND.help: Set Spanning tree port

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure spanning-tree port type on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows setting edge-port type to an interface
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree port type edge

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree uplinkfast
COMMAND.help: Enables uplink fast on the port-channel

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure spanning-tree uplink fast on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE:
Uplink fast feature enhances STP performance for switches with redundant uplinks. Using the default value for the standard STP forward delay, convergence following a transition from an active link to a redundant link can take 30 seconds (15 seconds for listening and an additional 15 seconds for learning).
When uplink fast is configured on the redundant uplinks, it reduces the convergence time to just one second by moving to forwarding state (bypassing listening and learning modes) in just once second when the active link goes down.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree uplinkfast

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree bpdufilter
COMMAND.help: Spanning-tree BPDU filter on the port-channel

PARAM.name: enable
PARAM.help: Enables spanning-tree BPDU filter on the port-channel

PARAM.name: disable
PARAM.help: Disable spanning-tree BPDU filter on the port-channel

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${bpdufilt_sub_cmds}" = "enable";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_filter ${po_name} True
elif test "${bpdufilt_sub_cmds}" = "disable";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_filter ${po_name} False
fi

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure interface specific bpdu-filter parameters.
DOCGEN.USAGE: These commands allow configuring interface specific bpdu-filter parameters
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree bpdufilter enable sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree bpdufilter disable

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree guard
COMMAND.help: Configure spanning tree guard on port-channel

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure interface specific guard root parameters.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This commands allows enabling guard root on an interface
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree guard root

COMMAND.name: spanning-tree vlan
COMMAND.help: Configure spanning tree on port-channel for VLAN

PARAM.name: cost
PARAM.help: Set the port level cost value for VLAN

PARAM.name: port-priority
PARAM.help: Set the port level priority value for a VLAN

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Configure interface and vlan specific spanning-tree parameters.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This commands allows configuring interface and vlan specific spanning-tree parameters.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree vlan 100 cost 1000 sonic(conf-if-po1)# spanning-tree vlan 100 port-priority 16

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree
COMMAND.help: Unconfigure spanning tree on port-channel

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree bpdufilter
COMMAND.help: if spanning-tree BPDU filter on the port-channel is disabled, global bpdufilter will be applied

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure bpdufilter on a specific interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command removes the interface specific BPDU filter configuration and applies the global BPDU filter configuration.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# no spanning-tree bpdufilter

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree bpduguard
COMMAND.help: Disabled bpdu guard on the port-channel

PARAM.name: port-shutdown
PARAM.help: disable port shutdown on bpdu guard violation

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${port-shutdown}" != "";then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_ext_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_guard_port_shutdown ${po_name} False
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-stp.py patch_openconfig_spanning_tree_stp_interfaces_interface_config_bpdu_guard ${po_name} False
fi

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure bpduguard on a specific interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command removes the interface specific BPDU guard configuration.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# no spanning-tree bpduguard

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree cost
COMMAND.help: Unset the port level cost value for a VLAN

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure spanning-tree cost on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command resets the port level cost value
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# no spanning-tree cost

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree enable
COMMAND.help: Disables spanning-tree on the port-channel

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure spanning-tree on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command disables spanning-tree on an interface
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# no spanning-tree enable

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree link-type
COMMAND.help: Unset link type of the port-channel

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure spanning-tree link-type on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command resets the link-type configuration on an interface.
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# no spanning-tree link-type

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree portfast
COMMAND.help: Disables portfast on the port-channel

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure spanning-tree portfast on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command disables portfast on an interface
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# no spanning-tree portfast

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree port-priority
COMMAND.help: Reset the port level priority on the port-channel

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure spanning-tree port priority on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command resets the port priority value on an interface to default value
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# no spanning-tree port-priority

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree uplinkfast
COMMAND.help: Disables uplink fast on the port-channel

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure spanning-tree uplink fast on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command disables uplink fast feature on an interface
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# no spanning-tree uplinkfast

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree port
COMMAND.help: Unset Spanning Tree port info

PARAM.name: type
PARAM.help: Unset port type of the port-channel

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unonfigure spanning-tree port type on an interface.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command disables edge-port type configuration an interface
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# no spanning-tree port type

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree guard
COMMAND.help: Unconfigure spanning tree guard on port-channel

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unonfigure interface specific guard root parameters.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This command allows disabling guard root on an interface
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# no spanning-tree guard root

COMMAND.name: no spanning-tree vlan
COMMAND.help: Unconfigure spanning tree on port-channel for given VLAN

PARAM.name: cost
PARAM.help: Unset the port level cost value for VLAN

PARAM.name: port-priority
PARAM.help: Unset the port level priority value for a VLAN

DOCGEN.DESCRIPTION: Unconfigure interface and vlan specific spanning-tree parameters.
DOCGEN.USAGE: This commands removes interface and vlan specific spanning-tree parameters and sets to default value
DOCGEN.EXAMPLE: sonic(config)# interface PortChannel 1 sonic(conf-if-po1)# no spanning-tree vlan 100 cost sonic(conf-if-po1)# no spanning-tree vlan 100 port-priority
